name: Wedding Photography Experience
description:
"Marriage is a mosaic you build with your spouse. Millions of tiny moments that create your love story"-Jennifer Smith- and I love to be a part to capture these special moments. 

With passion for photography, especially photography, i want to capture every single happy moment of couples, people, friends i meet- to transfer their LOVE's spirit through photography and more importance is people feel LOVE and to be LOVED via photography
